short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to mark spam reviews on Shopify app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
There are a lot of fake reviews on Shopify Apps in recent days. Since it's difficult for us to track fake reviews. 

We’ve built a community-based tracking system. Here's how to use this:
1. Add the extension to your browser
2. Authenticate your App/s
3. Go to your Shopify App reviews and report fake reviews.
4. All these fake reviews will end up on the ‘loser-board’ which will be visible to all App Devs.

We'll be sending a report to Shopify once a week. Hopefully, they find these reports useful.
